content: Yes, it is possible to request milder spiciness levels in Jaffna restaurants. Jaffna cuisine is known for being spicy, but restaurants will typically accommodate customer requests for a milder flavor. When ordering, you can ask for the dish to be made with less chili powder or ask the chef to adjust the spice level to your preference. However, it is important to note that some dishes may still have a certain level of spiciness, even if it is made with less chili powder or other spices.
